column5: http://www.yourdailymedia.com/media/118406..._Ball_Knock_Out  I thought he was going to hit a passing boat or something. Both were taken out BIG TIME
Haha! stupid is what stupid does sir

Not to mention littering! Idiots.  We had some guys up at the cottage do that one year. Thought it was funny till they knocked a kid off a surf board from about 200 m's. The kids Dad went over and well there was no more driving range if you know what I mean...Now that was funny
LOL thats the funniest thing ive seen in a while poor guy in the boat thats gonna leave a mark
Thats what I call a 24.Take out 2 guys with one Golf ball and no time to yell 4.Ouch   and very stupid
HA HA HA, oh man!  But watching it again, I dont think it hit the guy in the boat. Sounded like it hit the metal bar, then came back at the golfer.  Either way, HA HA HA
yea stoty, i think so too, no way it could have bounced off his head that hard
That's what ya' call a dead pull!  Funny stuff...
check it out in full screen (double click).Both guys look to be knocked O-U-T
Yep...down for the count.  LOL @ the morons
There is no way that a ball could bounce of someone's head, and come back hard enough to knock another person out.
Stoty never say never l have seen a lawn dart hit two people one in the hand diving to catch it and another persons foot. Just saying  Peace Ken Ps that was after war games with pellet guns.
ha ha ha  true enough I guess!  maybe that dude in the boat has a metal plate in his head! lol
